name: Welcome To... Chichester 2 : The Spy Of Chichester And The Eager Tourist Guide Demo
detailed_description:
Story

Continuing from where Episode 1 left off, the protagonist still believes he is in America. When faced with the truth, however, his world falls apart. What will it take to get him back on his feet ? And what secrets are being kept from him ?

Details

WTC 2 is the second part of a trilogy, and continues the comedy-drama story of the "Worlds Best Spy" and his diverted holiday, taking place over a far longer and more intricate story.

The demo features the complete game, but limits the game to 1 ending, limited choices and some dialogue is not present.

Credits

Some graphics are from Pexels and some sounds are from Freesound
Music by Hardcastle and Josh Woodward

short_description: The protagonist still believes he is in America, and whole world falls apart when he's told otherwise. How will he cope, and what secrets are being kept from him ?

fullgame.name: Welcome To... Chichester 2 : The Spy Of Chichester And The Eager Tourist Guide

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 upwards
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
